title: Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Have to set PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% launch options to get it to work. Even then the text in the game is hit or miss if it will show up or not. Especially in menus.
